description: Protect your Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9 inch tablet with this CaseCrown Bold Trifold Case at all timesStyleYou can think of the Bold Trifold as an upgrade from the Bold Standby. Although the design is a little different, all the essential qualities are the same. The sectional front cover design is the inspiration behind its name, Bold Trifold. This case shows off a simple and classy look that that appeals to both students and professionals alike.FunctionThe all-around pocket and velcro flap help secure the tablet in place for a snug fit. The front cover is uniquely designed to transform into a comfortable viewing stand as well. Precise cut-outs and openings enable convenient full access to all Kindle Fire HD 8.9 features, including perforation for the dual-speakers. And most importantly, the built-in magnetic strip provides the sleep/wake feature.ProtectionThe durable synthetic leather exterior and soft suede-like interior build-up of the case provides great protection from damage and unwanted scratches so you can just grab your Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and be ready to go, knowing it will be protected at all times.
title: CaseCrown Bold Trifold Case (Black) for Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9 Inch (Built-in magnet for sleep / wake feature)
